attributes.action: look at different models for Higher Education funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current fee system for Higher 

- Education funding is broken with students taking large financial risks and getting into huge amounts of debt. 

- The current system compounds inequality, with those students from disadvantaged backgrounds being affected the worst.

The Goverment needs to look at different models for funding Higher Education.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "look at different models for Higher Education funding."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20318


Prime Minister's Office
